app.name: Guojie
app.slogan: Photo Editing, Powered by Guojie AI

modal.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
modal.imageServiceRequired: Note: Currently showing the image generation prompt. To display the actual image, image generation service integration (such as DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, etc.) is required.

error.checkBackendLogs: Please check the backend console logs for detailed diagnostic information.

imageEditor.title: Edit Image
imageEditor.hint: Tip: Drag to select crop area, use slider to adjust scale
imageEditor.hintSquare: Tip: Drag the crop box to move it, drag blank area to create new crop area, use slider to adjust scale

projectLibrary.title: Conversation History
projectLibrary.subtitle: View and manage all your chat sessions
projectLibrary.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history? This action cannot be undone and will delete all projects and images.
projectLibrary.clearError: Failed to clear history, please check the console for details
projectLibrary.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

customerService.title: Customer Service
customerService.subtitle: We're here to help and support you
customerService.contactPlaceholder: Please enter your WeChat ID, QQ number, or phone number
customerService.submitSuccess: Feedback submitted successfully! We will contact you soon.
customerService.submitError: Submission failed, please try again later
customerService.scanQRCode: Scan QR Code to Add Service WeChat
customerService.qrHint: Use WeChat to scan and add service WeChat
customerService.noReplyYet: Service has not replied yet, please wait patiently
